name: ELX
description:
Elx is a creature that wake up without memory in a strange place, an ominous voice tell him to enter a portal which bring him to fill-up places in the human world, He need to gather all the fullium to exit it's current situation

Made for the Epic Megajam 2021 in 7 days, all the assets are made by me in the time span of the jam.

Controls:

Movement:

  • KEYBOARD: WASD
  • GAMEPAD: Left Stick

Jump:

  • KEYBOARD: Space
  • GAMEPAD: A Button

Roll:

  • KEYBOARD: Shift
  • GAMEPAD: RB

Menu:

  • KEYBOARD: Escape or M Key
  • GAMEPAD: Right Special Button
